verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Yet will I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \add more\add* upon \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and upon \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; \w afterwards|strong="H0310"\w* he will let you \w go|strong="H7971"\w* hence: when he shall let \add you\add* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, he shall \w surely|strong="H1644"\w* thrust you \w out|strong="H1644"\w* hence \w altogether|strong="H3617"\w*.

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* now in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and let every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w borrow|strong="H7592"\w* of his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, and every \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* of her \w neighbour|strong="H7468"\w*, \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*. Moreover the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \add was\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, About \w midnight|strong="H3915"\w* will I go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*:

And all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, from the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* that \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* upon his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, even unto the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of the \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w* that \add is\add* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* the \w mill|strong="H7347"\w*; and all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*.

And there shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, such as there was \w none|strong="H3808"\w* like it, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* shall be like it any \w more|strong="H3254"\w*.

But against any of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall not a \w dog|strong="H3611"\w* \w move|strong="H2782"\w* his \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, against \w man|strong="H0376"\w* or \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*: that ye may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* how that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* doth put a \w difference|strong="H6395"\w* between the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And all these thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* shall come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* unto me, and bow \w down|strong="H7812"\w* themselves unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Get thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w follow|strong="H7272"\w* thee: and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that I will go \w out|strong="H3318"\w*. And he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* in a \w great|strong="H2750"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*.\f + \fr 11.8 \ft that follow…: Heb. that is at thy feet\f*\f + \fr 11.8 \ft a great…: Heb. heat of anger\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* shall not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto you; that my \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* may be \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* all these \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w* \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, so that he would not let the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* go \w out|strong="H7971"\w* of his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.
